articles.description: Rakhi Sawant, who entered Bigg Boss 14 as a challenger, spoke about her roller-coaster journey on the show, the focus on her marriage and how the show has evolved from season 1.
articles.content: Rakhi Sawant is happy and satisfied with the way her journey on Bigg Boss 14 culminated. The Pardesiya girl was probably the only contestant this season to have taken an effort to entertain the audie… [+4358 chars]
